variants.Description in input context: The variant causes a missense mutation at the codon 330, resulting in the replacement of glutamine with a stop codon.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line transfected with wild-type and mutant PTEN constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: The mutant PTEN protein was undetectable compared to the wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for both wild-type and mutant PTEN constructs.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PTEN cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No empty vector or negative control was mentioned in the literature.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: No benign or likely benign variants were mentioned in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis between wild-type and mutant PTEN samples.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than the background level.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Undetectable protein expression or significantly lower than wild-type samples.
